name: Sustainpath
description: Sustainpath was founded in response to today's need to integrate sustainability as a way of life, going beyond numbers, reporting and compliance. Â It works with different targets audience helping them set and achieve goals in sustainability. a) Students & communities through workshops, custom created courses helping them walk the talk on sustainability b) Social enterprises & Non profits by helping accelerate progress on SDG goals 6, 7, 11, 12 & 13 through program ideation, proposal writing, fund raising, monitoring & evaluation, & mentoring future leaders
